--- title: "Total Warrior" date: "2012-07-04" author: "Adrian Joseph" image: https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport/2012-07-04_TOTAL_WARRIOR/img/00.png categories: [race report, obstacle race] format: html lightbox: match: auto effect: fade desc-position: right loop: false --- ![](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport/2012-07-04_TOTAL_WARRIOR/img/00.png) A challenging and fun obstacle race in the Yorkshire. Denis and I drove up there and ran the course together. Personally I think that the Sheffield Man Of Steel was a better event, but there is nothing wrong with this. They definitely make use of the larger budget by building larger obstacles over a wider field. At the end there was beer and to shower we had to use freezing cold water coming out of a pipe they used to get drinking water for the horses. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
